tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mondrian_organizations; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mondrian_organizations AS SELECT org.amp_org_id, org.name AS org_name, org.org_code, COALESCE(grp.amp_org_grp_id, 999999999) amp_org_grp_id, COALESCE(grp.org_grp_name, 'Undefined') org_grp_name, COALESCE(tp.amp_org_type_id, 999999999) amp_org_type_id, COALESCE(tp.org_type, 'Undefined') org_type_name, tp.org_type_code FROM amp_organisation org LEFT JOIN amp_org_group grp ON org.org_grp_id = grp.amp_org_grp_id LEFT JOIN amp_org_type tp ON grp.org_type = tp.amp_org_type_id UNION ALL SELECT 999999999, 'Undefined', 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined', 'Undefined' ORDER BY amp_org_id;
